title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk for a divorced woman

preview.html: Because the details of the dream and the social status of the dreamer affect the meaning, and this is what we explain in our article today through the following lines from the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing drinking milk in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a lot of milk in a dream for a single girl. It is good skin for happiness and comfort in life. And God knows best. When a single girl dreams of drinking milk in a dream, it is a sign of the end of the anxiety and distress she suffered in her life, and God knows best. As for the unmarried girl who saw herself drinking wolf’s milk in a dream and rejoiced. This dream indicates that he is committing immorality and hiding it from society, and God knows best. I know. Seeing drinking milk in large quantities in an unmarried girl’s dream is the best evidence that she will marry a good, suitable, and rich man, and God knows best. The appearance of pure, impurities-free milk in a dream for a single girl. This indicates entering into a healthy and good relationship with a good young man. When she dreams For an unmarried girl to drink milk in a dream, and it smells nice. Good news that she will achieve her ambitions and desires in a short time, and God knows best. For an unmarried, engaged woman, when she sees guests drinking milk in cups in a dream. The best sign is that her marriage is near, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl eating large quantities of Abundant milk until she feels full. A sign that she will soon get married and leave her family home. See also: Interpretation of milk in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of watching milk in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she drinks milk and it was pure in the dream. This dream shows that he is a strong and energetic personality. All the time. Seeing a married woman drinking milk in a dream and enjoying its taste in the dream is an indication that she is doing her role in taking care of her husband, her home, and her children as much as she can, and God knows best. And a married woman dreams of seeing herself drinking cloudy milk in a dream. This dream shows major differences between her and her husband. If she sees pure milk in her dream, it symbolizes the end of these quarrels and disputes, and God knows best. Seeing milk in large quantities in a dream for a married woman is good news and blessings in the home, and God knows best. She is a married woman who dreams that her husband is eating milk. This indicates that he is a husband. He is righteous, performs his duties, and cares about her rights, and God knows best. Or seeing snake milk in a dream for a married woman. This indicates that an evil woman has entered her life with the intention of demolishing it and damaging the house of the dreamer, and God knows best. And when a married woman dreams of dried milk on her breasts in a dream, this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is falling short of Her husband’s right and he cares about him, and God knows best. Seeing herself drinking spoiled milk in a dream for a married woman. Which is eating from forbidden money is a warning vision for her and her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of drinking milk in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man when he dreams that he is drinking tiger’s milk in a dream. A warning vision for him. Because it indicates that he takes his money from what is forbidden, and God knows best. Either the man sees himself drinking bird’s milk in a dream. Good news for him to get what he wants in the right way. Thus, the man who dreams of drinking sheep’s milk in the dream...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman and its meaning in detail. Seeing children is one of the most common dreams, especially infants. The vision becomes dear to the soul if you see this child smiling, caressing the dreamer, or carrying him, because children are among the most beautiful blessings of God and represent the adornment of life. But seeing this dream means the unmarried girl’s kindness and livelihood, or is it contrary to reality and symbolizes a problem that concerns her, and we will answer this question in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman: This dream has many repercussions for the unmarried girl, including that it indicates that she will get rid of problems. And the sorrows that she suffers from in reality, and this dream indicates the progress of a young man with good morals. If she hears the sound of a child laughing in a dream, this vision is good news for her that her marriage is indeed imminent. As for breastfeeding a child in a dream, this vision is not good for her and indicates worries and sorrows. And problems. As for the dream of a crying child for an unmarried girl, this vision serves as a warning message to her about the need to be careful about the decisions she makes in reality. If an unmarried woman sees a child talking in a dream, this vision shows her desire to express her feelings that are hidden inside her. In the event that a child is born in a dream, this dream indicates that what you wish for in reality will come true. If the child in the dream is beautiful in appearance, then this vision indicates his marriage to a person with good morals. If an unmarried girl sees a child suffering from weakness and emaciation, then this The vision is not good and indicates that she is going through some difficulties and problems in reality. Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman. In the event that an infant sees an unmarried woman, this vision shows her marriage to the one she loves in reality. If the child is beautiful in appearance, and if the child is ugly, this indicates However, she is going through a financial crisis in reality. If an unmarried girl sees that a child is crying, this vision symbolizes the worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. One of the symbols of this dream is that it indicates the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing a child in A dream for an unmarried woman, and before we conclude this article, we must note that all of these mentioned interpretations are only interpretations of the legal interpretation and we cannot be sure of verification in reality, because only God knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can download the Direct application for dream interpretation.

title: Do you know the interpretation of a dream about paper money in a single woman’s dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream for a single woman has many meanings that we rely on in our topic today, in which we list all the opinions of dream interpretation scholars, whether they are positive, as indicated by many interpretations, or negative, depending on the various details. Received. What is the interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a single woman’s dream? Many interpretive scholars said that an unmarried girl’s vision of any type of money, whether metal or paper, is evidence that she is currently going through a major problem and is looking for a solution, and the vision is good news for her. That this problem will end, no matter how difficult it is. If she sees that she has found a set of bills, she will find many opportunities that may not come to her again, and if she gets this money, she will seize the most suitable opportunity for her and win as much as possible. Her vision may indicate the happy life that awaits her in the future and compensation for the suffering and pressure that she has recently suffered due to the delay in her marriage. It may also express a state of confusion that makes her unable to make the appropriate decision, as more than one person may propose to her at the same time and she does not She can tell the difference between them because of her lack of life experience. It is best to consult an older and experienced person to lay the foundation of your choice. The dreamer may be an ambitious girl who always strives to achieve goals that everyone around her is struggling to achieve, but inside her the strength and determination to achieve the best remains. Some scholars said that seeing paper money in a dream for women is not For married women, it expresses the good news that will come soon and will bring about many positive changes in their lives. If a girl sees it on her way to school or university, it is success that accompanies her studies, and the high grades that she will receive at the end of the school year. Basically, the goals that the girl has set It is very difficult for herself, but she does not give in to failure or despair, and seeing this money is evidence that she overcame many difficulties until she reached her goal. Among the evils of the vision is that the girl finds a bunch of worn-out banknotes, and here we find that signs of sadness and pain prevail. Interpretation of a dream about Banknotes for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the presence of paper money in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she has wonderful characteristics that make her capable of facing problems, no matter how difficult they are. However, if the girl is far from her Lord, she must return quickly and repent for the sins and transgressions that she has committed over a long period of time. Her life, and it may be the most important reason why she has not achieved her goals so far. Money is psychological support that pushes her to move on the right path. Ibn Sirin said: If a girl finds five notes, this is clear evidence that she has neglected what God has imposed on Muslims. Islam is based on five pillars and none of them should be demolished. If she is currently looking for a job that suits her qualifications and is very tired and almost desperate to get a job, she will succeed in finding one.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about nationalities for single people from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Nationalities Interpretation of a dream for a single woman Sex is one of the vital processes for human survival on earth, and it is necessary for the human race not to perish, but it is one of the things that a girl may be ashamed to talk about with those close to her, so she will seek to interpret this vision herself and this article will address the interpretation of the dream of nationalities with freedom. Nationalities Interpretation of a dream for a single woman The interpretation of this dream varies according to the images that the girl sees in the dream, and some interpreters believe that whoever has sex without her consent, this dream is considered a sign that the person who has sex with her will harm her. Others consider the interpretation of this vision as a disease that the seer will suffer from. Others also believe that this dream means that there is an enemy in her life and this enemy is planning evil or harm to cause her. This vision is a warning to the girl about the person she sees in the dream and warns her against dealing with him because of his bad intentions towards her. Some interpreters believe that this dream is not bad, but rather a good sign, as it is considered a harbinger of happy days and a good sign in her future life. Some interpreters believe that this vision could be news of a family that will contain this girl and live with her in comfort and peace. If a girl sees that someone is having sex with her in a dream, but she cannot see him, then this vision indicates that she will get married, but this marriage will not satisfy him. Some interpreters believe that this vision portends a marriage that will not last long due to some events that this girl does not accept to live. Interpretation of the dream of single nationalities by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that sex in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates a happy life for that girl, if a person with white skin has sex with her, but if his skin color is black, this means problems and troubles in her life. But she will get rid of these problems and her life will remain stable. Whoever sees a strange young man engaged to her is an unpleasant dream, as it indicates a problem or injury from a close person. It can also mean that she is ready to do something wrong. This same dream may indicate a close marriage with a person unknown to her, if this girl is pure and maintains her duties and performs the right of God in prayer, fasting, and others. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about sex by Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever has intercourse or abstains in a dream is a person who suffers from a loss of energy and is a lazy person who does not do certain things or seeks to change his circumstances. He also believes that this dream is interpreted as a dangerous waste of money and bad wisdom in using it, because this dream is a warning to the monarch. He also believes that this dream means divorce if the dreamer is married, and if the dreamer is poor, then this dream is one of the most hated visions for him, as it foretells a serious illness that afflicts that dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a single woman Whoever sees that a strange man accompanies her and knows

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a white mouse, the interpretation of a dream about a small white mouse, and the interpretation of a dream about a white mouse in the house

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a white mouse. Commentators believe that the vision is good and carries some negative interpretations at the same time. Interpretation of a dream about a white mouse by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a white mouse? A white mouse in a dream shows enemies and indicates the presence of someone who is deceiving the dreamer and planning to harm him, so he must be careful. The vision indicates the presence of a woman with bad morals in the dreamer’s life, and it is a warning to him to stay away from her so that he does not regret it later. The dream also warns the dreamer that he will be exposed to theft or fraud in the near future, so he must pay attention if the dreamer sees a white mouse emerging from the darkness in his dream, This means that his enemies will harm him, but the Lord (Almighty) will grant him victory over them after a short time. The dream may predict that the dreamer will suffer from a certain illness or illness that will last for a long time, but if the mouse dies in the vision, this means that this problem will end quickly without leaving a trace. negatively on his health. What is the interpretation of a dream about a white mouse by Ibn Sirin? It indicates the presence of an evil friend in the dreamer’s life who does not intend to do good and is dragging him into trouble and trouble. However, if the dreamer sees many white mice, this indicates an abundance of livelihood and an increase in money. Ibn Sirin believes that the mouse White in a dream symbolizes the improvement of material conditions and success in practical life, but if the dreamer sees the mouse leaving his house, this portends bad luck and shows that this house suffers from a lack of blessings and the dreamer suffers from a lack of success in his life. In the event that the dreamer hits the mouse And exposing him to harm, the dream foretells that a woman in the dreamer’s life will get hurt, get sick, or suffer from a major problem, so he must pay attention to the woman in his life and take care of her. To them. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site... You will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream of a white mouse for a single woman. A white mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman portends misfortune, as it indicates that she will soon be exposed to a difficult situation of It would harm her reputation, so she must be careful in all her next steps. It indicates the presence of a cunning person in her life, but she loves him, respects him, feels comfortable in his presence, and does not expect betrayal from him, and the vision carries a message that tells her not to trust anyone completely and warns her against everyone. It is said that the color White denotes goodness, so a white mouse symbolizes the emergence of a minor problem soon in the dreamer’s life, but it will end after a while and will not leave a negative impact on her life. If she is happy to see a mouse in a dream and is not afraid of it, this means that she will soon marry someone An intelligent and successful man who has a lot of money and loves her very much. Interpretation of a dream about a small white mouse for a single woman: It indicates the presence of a weak enemy in the visionary’s life who is harming her by making up lies and spreading rumors about her. She should beware of him despite his weakness, but he does everything in his power to harm her. If she sees an unmarried woman A small mouse, bright white, with a beautiful shape, and she played with it during the vision, means that she spends time with

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that you eat beans in a dream In the following lines we will present the interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream, all of these and more details that interest you, according to the interpretations of scholars..Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream can indicate a lack of money, and God I know: When you see a girl eating uncooked beans, this may indicate that there is a problem, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating green beans, this may be evidence of good circumstances, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees beans, this may indicate her marriage. From a poor man, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating hot green peppers in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating hot green peppers in a dream could be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man dreams of eating hot green peppers, this may indicate marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees Herself eating hot green peppers in a dream, this may be evidence of achieving goals, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself eating green hot peppers, it may symbolize happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating white honey in a dream. title: Interpretation of eating fruit in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of eating strange fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of eating fruit from trees in a dream

preview.html: Eating fruit in a dream Fruit is considered one of the foods that contain many benefits because it contains very important elements that help the body restore its vitality and activity, and the interpretation of this vision is one that most interpreters agree upon, as it carries many indicators and connotations. Interpretations such as marriage, tranquility, lack of fear, kindness, and wealth after poverty. Eating fruit in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of eating fruit in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit on time is evidence that the dreamer lives a happy life and enjoys peace of mind, and if its taste is sweet, this is an indication of success. His relationship with his life partner. If it spoils and eats, this indicates the presence of many problems and fears in the fortuneteller’s life and indicates his illness and extreme fatigue. If the dreamer hosts some people and eats with them, this is evidence of his promotion at work and his leadership over them. Seeing the dreamer himself eating black cranberries means that he will face Many difficult problems in his professional life. If he sees in his dream that he is eating watermelon, this is evidence that he will get rid of his problems and worries, and he will feel very comfortable and calm, and it indicates that he will obtain livelihood and livelihood. The fact that it was frozen. Eating fruit in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one eats an inappropriate fruit in a dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money through illegal and forbidden means, and indicates that he is going through serious financial difficulties and his many debts. If the fruit does not contain seeds This is evidence of the blessing of working, living, and achieving dreams and goals without getting tired, in addition to obtaining a lot of money through legitimate means. If the dreamer becomes afraid while eating it, this indicates his sense of security, and if he is surrounded by family problems and fears, this indicates their solution and reunification again. If a divorced woman dreams of this dream, this leads her to obtain all her rights from her ex-husband, and if she sees a stranger giving her an amount of fruit while she is eating it, this indicates that she will obtain goodness, livelihood, and income. A new life full of happiness and free of fatigue and trouble. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Eating fruit in a dream for a single woman. Seeing fruits in general in her dream is evidence that her husband is righteous and has a respectable personality. And high morals that he respects and protects. The interpretation of a dream about eating fruit for an unmarried woman indicates that she has good morals, is deeply religious, and is close to God Almighty. If she eats it in a dream when it is not fresh, it means that she has lost a lot of money, her morals have been corrupted, and she has committed many Of sins. If it is rotten, then this dream suggests that he will face some difficulties and obstacles. In her life. If it was impure and she ate it, this indicates that she committed some injustice and it will affect her negatively. Eating fruit in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is eating fruit in a dream, this is evidence that she is living a peaceful life.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing eating fish in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of eating fish: Fish is one of everyone's favorite seafood, as it provides the body with many beneficial nutrients and vitamins. Fish is prepared in different ways, such as grilled and fried, but when he sees fish in a dream, the dreamer searches for different interpretations of this vision and its connotations and meanings. Seeing eating fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirini Dreaming of eating fish Fish in the dreamer’s dream is an indication that he will obtain a lot of money, kindness, and great livelihood. And if a man sees a fish in his dream, this indicates the presence of a woman in his life. Also, if he sees an uncooked fish, this indicates that there are many enemies lurking around him who want to harm him. Fishing in a dream indicates that he will achieve many successes in his life. And if the dreamer takes pearls out of the fish’s mouth, this means that he will soon have a child. When he sees that he is buying fish in his dream, this indicates that his marriage is approaching, and seeing grilled fish in a dream means that he will triumph over all his enemies. Seeing dead fish is a sign of caution against... Something. Seeing eating fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. When the dreamer sees that he is eating raw fish, this means that he will gain a prominent position and a high position in his work. Eating grilled fish in a dream indicates that God will answer all his prayers, and if the dreamer sees himself eating pistachio, then this It means that he will travel soon to gain knowledge from another country. Putting fish in flour and then frying it in oil indicates that the dreamer is making hard efforts to find money, but he always spends it on useless things. Seeing that he is eating fish but it has many thorns indicates that there are disagreements. Between him and his family members. When the dreamer sees that he is buying grilled fish and serving it on a plate to someone close to him, this indicates that he will soon have good luck. Fishing in unclean water is a sign of living a life full of anxiety and depression. The Dream Interpretation section on the Egyptian website from Google, contains There are thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. Seeing eating fish in a dream for a single woman. Eating fish in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will be blessed with a partner who has good morals and good manners. If she sees that she is eating grilled fish, this means that she will marry a man who will live a life of luxury and happiness, When an unmarried woman sees that she is eating fish, this means that she will achieve all her goals and ambitions. Eating fish in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that she will receive blessings and goodness in her life, and if she sees a fish, this indicates that she will enjoy happiness and joy. Seeing eating fish in a dream for a married woman, and the vision indicates kindness and contentment, especially if her husband gives it to her, as it indicates Pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees a live fish in her dream, this is a sign of some positive changes in her life, and if she sees herself eating fried fish, this means that she will receive a large sum of money. If she sees that she is eating fish with her husband, this is a sign that disagreements between

title: Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Many people are exposed to seeing graves in a dream, which causes them to feel anxious and uncomfortable. In this article, the interpretation of seeing graves in a dream by Imam Muhammad bin Sirin. Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Muhammad bin Sirin said about the interpretation of seeing graves in a dream that this dream can be an indication that the dreamer will return to the path of God Almighty and rely on sins and deeds that are forbidden by Sharia. Seeing graves in a dream may be a bad omen, and it also indicates the distress that afflicts the dreamer, as he may be exposed to some problems in his life that lead to worries and sorrow. If the one who sees the graves feels intense fear in the dream, this dream indicates that he will obtain security in his real life, but if he feels happy and comfortable when seeing the graves in a dream, he will suffer from a constant feeling of fear in reality because he will be surrounded by problems from every side. Imam Muhammad bin Sirin believes that if a person sees himself reading the tombstones in a dream, this dream indicates that he will be assigned some tasks that will affect his heart and he will not feel comfortable in his field of work. If a person sees the ruler burying some people in the graves, this is a welcome sign for Imam Ibn Sirin, as it shows that the ruler is just and communicates with the subjects and their problems. And whoever sees that the ruler is in the cemetery, and the people around him are wailing and crying and he does not care, this dream indicates the emergence of injustices on him without the ruler removing these injustices and achieving justice among the people. When a person sees that he is walking on the graves in a dream, this is a warning vision for the monarch, as it indicates that his end is approaching, so he must take the initiative to do good and stop sins. If he sees one of his friends buried in graves and covered with dirt, this dream indicates that this friend will cause many problems and troubles for the dreamer. The interpretation of seeing graves in a dream indicates that a person has gone through many difficult situations that lead to psychological pain, if the dreamer is buried in these graves and covers his face with dirt. If the dreamer visits the graves to recite Al-Fatihah On the dead, this vision indicates that the seer will have a great livelihood and all his worries will go away. Read also: God’s supplication to make the people of the graves happy, written and complete. Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream for an unmarried woman has many implications. It may be a sign that she will be very happy to hear the news of her happiness if she visits the graves and grieves for a dead person she does not know. Low voice. If an unmarried girl sees herself going to visit the graves, and the tombstones bear the names of people she knows by their family name, and the unmarried girl begins to scream loudly, then the interpretation of this dream is that she will enter into a situation of sadness and emotional shame. If an unmarried girl sees that she is afraid of seeing graves in a dream, then the interpretation of this dream is that she fears the experience of marriage, as the idea of ​​​​failing her future marriage is one of the thoughts that dominates her all the time. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is walking

title: Interpretation of seeing a failed engagement or marriage in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a failed engagement or marriage failure in a dream in detail. Through our article, we will learn about the meanings of a dream about failed courtship in a dream. It indicates ambitions and dreams that come true, or it may indicate envy, or it indicates sustenance, and it indicates some unpleasant visions, and The evidence varies depending on the situation, and we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, or Al-Nabulsi. What is the interpretation of seeing a failed engagement or marriage in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? If an unmarried woman sees that she is engaged, she is happy with it, meaning that she will achieve her dreams and ambitions. Seeing the engagement being canceled in a girl’s dream shows that she is hasty in Her decisions. Seeing the repeated cancellation of an engagement in a girl’s dream indicates envy. Seeing a girl engaged to a familiar person and arguing about her marriage to a young man about morals and religion. Seeing attending a father’s engagement indicates that the difficult and impossible stages have passed. Seeing a virgin girl getting engaged in a man’s dream indicates that he achieved what he desired. And his rise to a leadership position. What is the interpretation of a dream about engagement and disapproval of a bachelor? If an unmarried girl sees herself forced to accept someone’s engagement, this indicates the problems that have been dealt with. If a girl sees that she refused to marry someone on the wedding night, this indicates harm and damage to this person. If an unmarried girl sees that the image of her fiancé is ugly and ugly, it indicates the failure of the marriage or the dissolution of the engagement. What is the interpretation of a dream about the groom being proposed and rejected? If an unmarried girl sees herself rejecting the one who marries her, it appears that he is in a bad psychological state. Seeing dissatisfaction with the girl’s proposed brother-in-law is It indicates that this marriage will result from evil and wickedness. A girl dreams of her fiancé in an unpleasant or unpleasant way, announcing the dissolution of the engagement. What is the interpretation of a dream about engagement for men? If a man sees that he is engaged to a beautiful girl, it indicates sustenance and the abundance of goodness that he encounters in his life. If he sees If a man sees that he is engaged to a Christian woman, it indicates many disagreements around him. What is the interpretation of a dream that you are forced to marry an unmarried woman? If a girl sees that she is forced to marry From a stranger It shows that she is running away from her responsibilities. Dreaming of marriage in a single woman’s dream It indicates a new stage in her life. Seeing a forced marriage for a girl shows her rejection of a job she does not want or something she does not really like. Seeing marriage in a dream for a single woman indicates that you hold a high position or a high position. What is the interpretation of a dream that I am engaged to someone I do not know? If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying a foreigner or whom she does not know, it shows positive changes in her life, if she is happy, but if she feels unhappy, then this is a bad vision and indicates that evil and evil will happen to her. Seeing jealousy in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates bad luck and the problems she faces. If a young man sees that he is attending an engagement, it indicates that this young man will get married soon. If a young man sees that he married an old woman and did not know her, it announces the fulfillment of his hopes and aspirations. If a married woman sees that she is engaged again, it indicates
